title: marble madness
content:
deliriously hungry open maw double doors
trefoil crowned teeth limestone stain
rainbow shadowplay on the stone vault
soul swallower wicked fiend friend

resin smoke through nostrils caustic
clamoring echoes acoustic fever dream
paralyzing labyrinth marble endless pit
gargoyle predator graceless wings clipped

frozen light contained heat sweating
candelabra wax drip liquid ash
innocence quagmire uneven footing lost
insincerity delivered dogheaded promise unkept
